mapper.select: SELECT goods.id AS goods_id, goods.name AS goods_name, goods_specification.id AS goods_specification_id, goods_specification.name AS goods_specification_name, special_goods_activity.discount_type, special_goods_activity.tenant_special_price, special_goods_activity.agent_special_price, special_goods_activity.tenant_discount_rate, special_goods_activity.agent_discount_rate FROM special_goods_activity INNER JOIN goods ON goods.id = special_goods_activity.goods_id AND goods.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN goods_specification ON goods_specification.id = special_goods_activity.goods_specification_id AND goods_specification.deleted = 0 WHERE special_goods_activity.deleted = 0 AND special_goods_activity.activity_id = #{activityId}
